name: Cheebs Urger
description:
Cheebs Urger is a game where you play as a little yellow chick named Cheebs and help him on his journey to get to the giant burger.

Bounce on platforms and eat as much as you can! But don’t get too big or small!

Try to avoid evil Cheebs!

And most importantly

 make sure to never

EVER

Eat an egg!




For questions or enquiries about Cheebs urger or feedback, please email: Davinastone99@gmail.com for direct contact with the developer.
